item.title: August 2015 Farmers Market report
item.description: At Ann Arbor Farmers Market: Red Haven peaches üçë, potatoes üç†, kale, green onions, tomatoes, red peppers, and a cherry snow cone for my shopping companion. (Testing to see how the emoji comes out; I didn’t see a kale emoji.)
